heading: Season 7 2.1.4 Patch Notes
content: The Season 7 2.1.4 Patch Notes is coming soon! As the 2.2.0 PTR is running and the is preparing for this new season 8 coming in a few weeks, news keeps rolling along with new patches for the Live server! This patch brings various bugfixes and performnce improvements. We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 PTR and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
